name: birdhouse
description: Contract-to-close transaction manager for residential real estate

scripts.frontend: wait-on http://localhost:3001/health && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.reset-db: rm -f backend/birdhouse.db backend/birdhouse.db-wal backend/birdhouse.db-shm && echo 'Database reset.'
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
